author: Heather Lamb
comment: Use it whenever you need to power up. 😊😊😊 Now with NEW IMPROVED shininess☇☇☇

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Heather...  You're a ray of sunshine :)

title: Shiny!

author: derek king
comment: So I don't buy many apps but I pretty much own all of this devs  watchfaces and by far this is my favorite.  Dev is always consistent and always packs on features after a watchface is put out.   If you own android wear you have to try these watchfaces as they are some of the best out there.  I hope we can maybe get some dc comics love in the future as I'd love to see what the dev could come out with for those watchfaces.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Derek, awesome review, ill take all you advice's into consideration and thanks for supporting me and helping making it happen :)

title: Must Own

author: Chris Holt
comment: If your name's Tony you can use this for backup power!  That's how real it looks. Really a work of art and buttery smooth!

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Chris, thanks so much sir... You know handling all that power is super dangerous... be careful around hazardous material :)

title: Keep Pepper away from this one

author: Tom Rowland
comment: Truly phenomenal! Love the raw feel to this face. I have my own Reactor! Now I just need to 3d print my suit, then I will forcibly bring world peace!!! Muhahahaaaa!!! Erm, yeah, awesome :)

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Tom, its like .. you read my mind!!!

title: Another beautiful watch in an amazing series!

comment: I have a number of your watch faces, everyone of them have great features and attention to detail.

reply.content: Word up Jimy, well thanks for the support it's awesome to know you collect them all! There's more coming soon... im crafting the hell of the upcoming release :)
